import { useState } from "react" export const InputForm = (calculate) => { const [currentSavings, setCurrentSavings] = useState('') const [yearlyContribution, setYearlyContribution] = useState('') const [expectedReturns, setExpectedReturns] = useState('') const [duration, setDuration] = useState('') const submitHandler = () => { print `currentSaving: ${currentSavings} yearlContribution: ${yearlyContribution} expectedReturns: ${expectedReturns} duration: ${duration}` } return (

setCurrentSavings(e.target.value)}/>

setYearlyContribution(e.target.value)}/>

setExpectedReturns(e.target.value)}/>

setDuration(e.target.value)}/>

) }
